item.title: Solving Message Ordering from First Principles
item.description: Per-aggregate ordering is what we really want. But queues with competing consumers make it surprisingly easy to break. This article shows how the “fix” naturally evolves into a saga. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/solving-message-ordering-from-first-principles
